channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Super Pocket Neo Geo Edition Review: Pocketable Fun
item.description: Portable retro greatness, with great compromises.

item.title: A New Era for WIRED—That Starts With You
item.description: As of today, there are even more ways to enjoy WIRED’s journalism, including premium newsletters and livestream Q&As. Join us.

item.title: Best Indoor Garden Systems (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Grow a backyard’s worth of greens and vegetables in your house with a vertical hydroponic garden. Here are a few that might be worth the investment.

item.title: Trump’s AI Action Plan Is a Crusade Against ‘Bias’—and Regulation
item.description: The Trump administration’s new AI policy blueprint calls for limited regulation and lots of leeway for Big Tech to grow even bigger.

item.title: Avalanche Energy hits key milestone on the road to a desktop fusion reactor
item.description: Seattle-based Avalanche recently operated its desktop fusion machine for hours on end while maintaining 300,000 volts.

item.title: Hundreds of organizations breached by SharePoint mass-hacks
item.description: One of the hacked organizations reportedly includes the U.S. agency responsible for maintaining the country's stockpile of nuclear weapons. China-back...

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: First full agenda reveal for the brand-new Going Public Stage
item.description: We recently unveiled the Going Public Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 — a new destination for founders navigating the complexities of company buildin...

item.title: How TRIC Robotics is reducing pesticide use on strawberries using UV light
item.description: TRIC Robotics just raised a $5.5 million seed round for its tractor-sized robots that help eliminate bacteria and pests on strawberry plants.

item.title: The GOP's Message for Tech Billionaires: Be Like Peter Thiel
item.description: One lesson Republican insiders took away from Elon Musk's spectacular flameout? Be wary of billionaires who love the spotlight.

item.title: Eight months in, Swedish unicorn Lovable crosses the $100M ARR milestone
item.description: Less than a week after becoming Europe’s latest unicorn, Swedish vibe coding startup Lovable has now crossed the $100 million annual recurring revenue...
